titleStmt.title: Articles of high misdemeanours humbly offer'd and presented to the consideration of His Most Sacred Majesty, and His Most Honourable Privy Councel, against Sir William Scrogs, Lord Chief-Justice of the Kings Bench, exhibited by Dr. Oats, and Captain Bedlow, together with His Lordships answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Scroggs, William, Sir, 1623?-1683, defendant.
Oates, Titus, 1649-1705.
Bedloe, William, 1650-1680.

notesStmt.note: "The answer of Sir William Scroggs" p. 5-8.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
